title: They Call It "Mystery Tech"
description: Get a 4-week trial, free postage, and a digital scale at  Thanks to Stamps.com for sponsoring the show!  Tiny Atari Arcade on Amazon:  Phillips Sleep Headphones with Kokoon:  Musicozy Sleep Headphones on Amazon:  Eargasm Earplugs on Amazon:  Xbox Mini Controller Hoodie:  The Couch Buddy on Amazon:  Microsoft Surface Laptop Studio 2 on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 The Smallest Arcade 1:32 I'm Getting Sleepy 3:32 Sleepier... 4:40 What's an Eargasm? 6:00 Stamps.com 7:04 A Pirate's Life for Me 10:05 Xbox Series Comfy 10:55 Your Best Gamer Buddy 12:23 The Surface Has Landed
